AWARD WINNING GOLF COURSE
LAKE VENICE GOLF CLUB
RATES
We now have all 27 holes open and ready for play.
​
Driving range is now open
​
​
​
Rates May Through October 2025
Dress Code: No Tank Tops or Cut Offs / Men’s shirts must have sleeves
Hours and prices subject to change. As of August 1, 2020 sales tax will charged
Rates
ABOUT US
Lake Venice Golf Club is an award-winning golf course. It was voted the Best Public Golf Course in Venice 2009-2018 & 2020. Located on the island of Venice, Lake Venice Golf Club allows you to play a round of golf while taking in the scenic views that the Gulf has to offer. 27 Beautiful Holes| Designed By Mark Mahannah. In 2013 Jan Bel Jan redesigned our award-winning holes 19 - 27. Rod Parry GM and Dave Knott Golf Professional.
27 Holes staring on 1 or 19 tees
Open to The Public
Walk Or Ride At Any Time, as we do not take tee times
Natural Beauty, not part of a housing development
Adjacent To The Gulf Of Mexico
Annual Memberships Are Available
Best Rates Year Round
Free Wi-Fi
Course/Slope Rating:
Blue Tees 70.5/125  |  White Tees 69.1/123  |  Gold Tees 65.8/110  |  Red Tees 62.6/104
Our History
